title: The Climb Music
body:
Hi Riot.
I was just wondering if there is going to be a separate release of the music from The Climb Cinematic.
I thought it was amazing, but its been a week since the release of the video, and the track still hasn't appeared on sound cloud.

Thanks

replies.body: Sorry for the delay - should be a couple more days at the most!
It took a little longer than anticipated but the track is finally up at https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/the-climb-music-from-the-cinematic

Hello there!
May I ask who made this absolutely fantastic piece, it gives me goosebumps every time! Thank you! I wanna check out more of your stuff! :)
Have a beautiful day!
